mapper.select: SELECT id, password, pwd_confirm_q, pwd_confirm_a , name, zipcode, address1, address2, tel, phone, email, birth, lev, point, total, join_date FROM tbl_member WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET password = #{password}, pwd_confirm_q = #{pwd_confirm_q}, pwd_confirm_a = #{pwd_confirm_a}, name = #{name}, zipcode = #{zipcode}, address1 = #{address1}, address2 = #{address2}, tel = #{tel}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, birth = #{birth} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE tbl_product SET wish_count = wish_count + 1 WHERE code = #{product_code}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tbl_wish_list WHERE member_id = #{member_id} and product_code = #{product_code}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_product SET wish_count = wish_count - 1 WHERE code = #{product_code}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id, p.code, p.name, p.price, p.wish_count, p.file_path FROM tbl_wish_list wl, tbl_member m, tbl_product p WHERE wl.member_id = m.id AND wl.product_code = p.code AND wl.member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_wish_list WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND product_code = #{product_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_cart (no, member_id, product_detail_no, quantity) VALUES (seq_cart_no.nextval, #{member_id}, #{product_detail_no}, #{quantity})
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_cart WHERE member_id = #{member_id} AND product_detail_no = #{product_detail_no}

SELECT c.no, c.member_id, c.quantity, pd.no as product_detail_no, pd.product_color, pd.product_size, pd.product_stock, p.code as product_code, p.name as product_name, p.price as product_price, p.file_path as product_file_path FROM tbl_cart c JOIN tbl_product_detail pd ON c.product_detail_no = pd.no JOIN tbl_product p ON pd.product_code = p.code WHERE member_id = #{member_id} ORDER BY p.name, c.no desc
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_cart WHERE member_id = #{member_id}
SELECT quantity FROM tbl_cart WHERE no = #{no}

SELECT p.code, p.file_path, p.name, p.price, pd.no as product_detail_no, pd.product_color, pd.product_size FROM tbl_product p join tbl_product_detail pd on p.code = pd.product_code WHERE pd.no = #{product_detail_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_order (code, member_id, delivery_charge, recipient_name, recipient_zipcode, recipient_address1, recipient_address2, recipient_tel, recipient_phone, recipient_email, message, pay_method, used_point) VALUES (#{code}, #{member_id}, #{delivery_charge}, #{recipient_name}, #{recipient_zipcode}, #{recipient_address1}, #{recipient_address2}, #{recipient_tel}, #{recipient_phone}, #{recipient_email}, #{message}, #{pay_method}, #{used_point})

INSERT INTO tbl_order_detail (order_code, product_detail_no, amount, discount, point, quantity, state) VALUES (#{order_code}, #{product_detail_no}, #{amount}, #{discount}, #{point}, #{quantity}, '입금 확인')
mapper.select: SELECT code, member_id, order_date, delivery_charge, recipient_name, recipient_zipcode, recipient_address1, recipient_address2, recipient_tel, recipient_phone, recipient_email, message, pay_method, used_point FROM tbl_order WHERE code = #{code}

SELECT od.order_code, od.product_detail_no, od.amount, od.discount, od.point, od.quantity, od.state, p.code as product_code, p.price as product_price, p.file_path as product_file_path, p.name as product_name, pd.product_color, pd.product_size, pd.product_stock FROM tbl_order_detail od, tbl_product p, tbl_product_detail pd WHERE od.product_detail_no = pd.no AND pd.product_code = p.code AND order_code = #{order_code}

SELECT p.code as product_code, p.file_path, p.name, pd.product_color, pd.product_size, pd.no as product_detail_no, o.code, o.order_date, od.state, od.point, od.amount, od.quantity FROM tbl_product p, tbl_product_detail pd, tbl_order o, tbl_order_detail od WHERE p.code = pd.product_code AND pd.no = od.product_detail_no AND o.code = od.order_code AND o.member_id = (SELECT id FROM tbl_member WHERE id = #{member_id})
AND to_char(order_date, 'yyyy-mm-dd') BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate}
AND od.state LIKE '%' || #{state} || '%'
ORDER BY o.code desc

SELECT p.code as product_code, p.file_path, p.name, pd.product_color, pd.product_size, od.quantity FROM tbl_product p, tbl_product_detail pd, tbl_order_detail od WHERE p.code = pd.product_code AND pd.no = od.product_detail_no AND od.order_code = #{order_code} AND od.product_detail_no = #{product_detail_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET point = point + #{point}, total = total + #{amount} WHERE id = #{member_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_review (no, member_id, title, content, product_detail_no, grade) VALUES (seq_review_no.nextval, #{member_id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{product_detail_no}, #{grade})
mapper.select: SELECT product_code FROM tbl_product_detail WHERE no = #{product_detail_no}
SELECT r.grade FROM tbl_review r, tbl_product_detail pd WHERE r.product_detail_no = pd.no AND pd.product_code = #{product_code}
SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_review r, tbl_product_detail pd WHERE r.product_detail_no = pd.no AND pd.product_code = #{product_code}
